projects.title: Antique Reproduction Shop
projects.description: A luxury site built with Oxygen, the leading page builder for WordPress.

projects.title: Motorsport Parts Australia
projects.description: Web design built with elementor to create a powerful, easy to use online shop for motorsport enthusiast.

projects.title: Repair Flow
projects.description: Built using React and MongoDB, Repair flow is a web application that streamlines the work order process through repair orders, time-tracking, task management and reporting features.

projects.title: The Tipsy Tiper
projects.description: Built with Nextjs, this is a fun application bringing in data from squiggle.com.au API, giving you the ablility to select two teams and predict a winner. Also showing the current round results from the API.
